testcase.classname: To Verify My Files Tabs Functionality
testcase.name: To verify functionality of View and Download the completed document of DrySign
testcase.system-out: Given navigate to URL "https://drysign-dev.exela.global/#/".................passed When enter the user name as "sid211@mailinator.com".........................passed When enter the password as"Malin@555".......................................passed And user click on the Login button..........................................passed And user click on continue with free version................................passed And user click on My Files..................................................passed And user click on completed documents tab...................................passed When user click on plus icon................................................passed Then user click on Mat icon.................................................passed And user click on View icon under Action column.............................passed And user should get display document........................................passed Then user click on Close icon...............................................passed Then user click on Mat icon.................................................passed When user click on Download icon............................................passed Then Document should get downloaded on local storage as "TimoManual"........passed
